title: What you should know about GMO (Genetically Modified Foods)
content: by Shenali Waduge Some facts: · Genetically modified organisms (GMOs) are now in over 30,000 food products · 92.5% of arable land around the world is GMO free · The first genetically modified food item, a tomato, appeared in the United States in 1994 and in Britain in 1996…
